creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: recto: small unfinished sketch of a baker, seen from back, wearing a short chef's hat, knickers and an apron, holding a steaming pudding; verso: profile portrait from PL side of a heavy-set man with fluffy hair (or wearing a fluffy hat?) wearing a long overcoat and spats
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

LRC, in pencil: [OVER / 16a / 26]
markings: ULC, impressed in paper: [STRATHMORE / TRADE (image of thistle) MARK / DRAWING BOARD]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled, recto and verso [baker with steaming pudding, recto; portrait of a heavy-set man in a coat, verso]
